items.value:
Hello,
could you find Michael?
I cant wait to finally see him again.
Sergio (his best friend) is also very excited.

The Birthday Party is sure to be a hit..
yes i found Michael for you!
Mkayyyy... i will try my best!

Incredible you found him?
Wow and such a great cake!

Michael is a great guy, visit him for assignments!
If you want another special task, come back...

You get: 5x Steak, 5x Blue Cow
thank you Romana and see you soon!

Oh...
and I thought you were done!
Come back when you found Michael and bring the Birthday Cake!

And please hurry...
The Birthday Party starts soon ..
Mkayyyy... i will try my best!
